stanza.line: Let me not to the marriage of true mindsminds
Admit impediments love is not lovelove
Which alters when it alteration findsfinds
Or bends with the remover to removeremove
O no it is an ever-fixed markmark
That looks on tempests and is never shakenshaken
It is the star to every wandring barkbark
Whose worth unknown although his height be takentaken
Love not Time fool though rosy lips and cheekscheeks
Within his bending sickle compass comecome
Love alters not with his brief hours and weeksweeks
But bears it out even to the edge of doomdoom
If this be error and upon me provedproved
I never writ nor no man ever lovedloved
